testimonials.name: Sarah Osei
testimonials.content: Nagor Rental & Decor made my wedding absolutely magical! The floral arrangements were breathtaking, and the gold phoenix chairs added such a regal touch. Highly recommended!

testimonials.name: Kwame Mensah
testimonials.content: I've worked with many vendors, but the professionalism and quality of items from Nagor are unmatched. Their delivery is always on time, and the items are in pristine condition.

testimonials.name: Ama Boateng
testimonials.content: The decoration for my 30th birthday was stunning. The mood lighting transformed the venue completely. Thank you for making my day so special!

testimonials.name: Jessica & David
testimonials.content: We were blown away by the attention to detail. Every single chair, table, and light was placed perfectly. Our guests couldn't stop talking about the decor.

hero.title: Elevate Your Events with Elegance
hero.subtitle: Nagor Rental & Decor transforms ordinary spaces into breathtaking environments. From luxury weddings to corporate galas, we bring your vision to life.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Nagor?
whyChooseUs.description: We don't just supply equipment; we supply peace of mind. With over 10 years of experience in the Ghanaian event industry, we understand that reliability is just as important as aesthetics.
benefits: Competitive pricing with no hidden fees

about.title: Who We Are
about.heading: Crafting Unforgettable Experiences Since 2015
paragraphs: Nagor Rental & Decor is a premier event styling and rental company based in Accra, Ghana. We specialize in transforming ordinary spaces into breathtaking environments that reflect our clients' unique style and vision.

Whether you are planning an intimate wedding, a grand corporate gala, or a lively birthday party, our team of experienced designers and logistics experts works tirelessly to ensure every detail is perfect.
We pride ourselves on our extensive inventory of high-quality furniture, lighting, and decor props, allowing us to offer competitive pricing without compromising on style or elegance.

servicesPage.title: Our Services
servicesPage.subtitle: We offer a wide range of decoration services tailored to your specific event needs, ensuring every detail is perfect.

rentalsPage.title: Rental Essentials
rentalsPage.subtitle: Browse our collection of premium event furniture, tents, and decor accessories for your next celebration.

footer.description: Premium event decoration and equipment rental services in Ghana. Making your special moments unforgettable with elegance, style, and reliability.

homeCTA.title: Ready to Transform Your Event?
homeCTA.subtitle: From intimate gatherings to grand celebrations, we have the perfect inventory for you.

sections.title: 1. Identification & Booking
sections.content: A valid ID is required for identification before booking. Booked and paid items cannot be cancelled; if cancelled, a 50% deduction will be applied to the refund.

sections.title: 2. Security Deposit
sections.content: A refundable security deposit of GHC 200.00 (or GHC 400.00 for glass items) must be paid before items are released.

sections.title: 3. Location & Delivery
sections.content: Warehouse items (Canopies, tables, chairs, etc.) are located at Comm. 22 Annex. Customers can arrange for delivery at an additional fee. Items must be returned specifically to the location where they were picked up.

sections.title: 4. Lost or Damaged Items
sections.content: The renter is responsible for the items. Any lost or damaged items must be paid for immediately upon return.

sections.title: 5. Return Schedule & Late Fees
sections.content: Items taken on Friday evening must be returned by Saturday evening or Sunday 7:00 AM. Items taken on Saturday evening must be returned by Sunday evening or Monday 8:00 AM. Failure to return items on time will result in additional charges.

sections.title: 6. Carpet Care Policy
sections.content: Carpets must be laid only on cemented floors. They must NOT be laid on wet or muddy floors. NOTE: A cleaning fee of GH₵ 200.00 will be charged for each carpet returned soiled with mud or dirt.

sections.title: 7. Catering Items Cleaning
sections.content: All chafing dishes, plates, dispensers, and cutlery must be cleaned thoroughly before they are returned. NOTE: A fee of GH₵ 200.00 will be charged if items are returned uncleaned.

privacyPolicy.content: At Nagor Rental & Decor, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you as to how we look after your personal data when you visit our website and tell you about your privacy rights.

sections.title: 1. Information We Collect
sections.content: We may collect, use, store and transfer different kinds of personal data about you which we have grouped together follows: Identity Data (name), Contact Data (email, phone, address), and Transaction Data (details of payments).

sections.title: 2. How We Use Your Data
sections.content: We will only use your personal data when the law allows us to. Most commonly, we will use your personal data to process your bookings and communicate with you regarding our services.
